questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product packaging?
What material appears to be used for the packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What is the primary text displayed prominently on the package?
What weight, in kilograms, is indicated on the packaging?
What kind of printing technique appears to be used on the packaging?
Does the packaging exhibit any visible texture?
Is the packaging's surface glossy or matte?
What language is the majority of the text on the package in?
Are there any noticeable barcodes present on the package?
What is the overall aesthetic style of the packaging?
Does the packaging include any images or illustrations?
Are there any seals or certifications visible on the packaging?
Is the text on the packaging predominantly serif or sans-serif?
What is the overall size of the packaging shown (in terms of dimensions)?
